<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Triumphant Inspiration](/Feats.aspx?ID=4625) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=546" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 106 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[warrior muse](/Muses.aspx?ID=4)

**Trigger**
You critically hit a foe with a melee weapon Strike or a melee unarmed attack

</column>

---

With a triumphant shout, you inspire your allies. You cast a [composition](/Traits.aspx?ID=559) cantrip you know that normally takes a single action to cast.
name: Triumphant Inspiration
